content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
Hello Maryam,

Let's start with a high price to see how much you are willing to pay. I think 1000 Euro per month is a reasonable price for such a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you for sharing the initial price proposal. However, as a budget-conscious student, I would like to see if we can reach an agreement on a more affordable rent. Could we consider a lower price, perhaps around 750 Euro per month? This would still allow me to take advantage of the convenient location while being more in line with my financial situation.

If you find this counterproposal unacceptable, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we seem to have a significant gap in our expectations regarding the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your counter proposal. I appreciate your honesty about your financial situation. However, I'm afraid 750 Euro per month is too low for me. As a greedy landlord, I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment. How about we meet in the middle, at 875 Euro per month? This is a good deal for you considering the location and amenities of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand your need to get a competitive price for your apartment but as a responsible individual, I must consider my budget. While 875 Euro per month is slightly higher than my initial offer, it's still a reduction from your initial proposal. I agree to the price of 875 Euro per month for renting this attractive apartment in an ideal city center location.

TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
